thread.section_title: Ecommerce Templates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ecommerce Templates | www.ecommercetemplates.com
thread.title: Jan Hall
thread.title_full: Ecommerce Templates reviewed by Jan Hall

author: Jan Hall
title: Jan Hall
text: We've been with Ecommerce Templates for 10+ years and their templates and support could not be better. Their templates are updated frequently to stay current with security and SEO needs, plus adding tons of additional features. I have never had an after-sale problem that was not handled quickly and by a support person that really cares. This is SO rare these days and I treasure my relationship with ECT and would never even consider going with another company for my webstore needs.
